definition: abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: The Hada Cake looks like a round casket.
sentences.chinese: 哈达火烧的形状像上下合在一起的小圆盒子。

sentences.english: When Ben-Hadad came out, Ahab had him come up into his chariot.
sentences.chinese: 便哈达出来见王，王就请他上车。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, alternatives to Jakartas Soekarno-HattaInternational Airport are being publicized.
sentences.chinese: 同时，哈达国际机场的替代选择被公布。

sentences.english: Hatha Yogis consider the body as the vehicle for the soul.
sentences.chinese: 哈达瑜伽修习者认为身体是心灵的承载工具。

sentences.english: And Benhadad hearkened unto king Asa, and sent the captains of his armies against the cities of Israel;
sentences.chinese: 便哈达听从亚撒王的话，派军长去攻击以色列的城邑。

sentences.english: And Ben-Hadad fled to the city and hid in an inner room.
sentences.chinese: 便哈达也逃入城，藏在严密的屋子里。

sentences.english: When Baal-Hanan son of Acbor died, Hadad succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 亚革波的儿子巴勒哈南死了，哈达接续他作王。

sentences.english: They like to give " Hada" to their honorable guests.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢给客人献上哈达，表示尊敬。

sentences.english: But I will send a fire into the house of Hazael, which shall devour the palaces of Benhadad.
sentences.chinese: 我却要降火在哈薛的家中，烧灭便哈达的宫殿。

sentences.english: And Hazael king of Syria died, and Benadad his son reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 阿兰王哈匝耳死后，他的儿子本哈达得继位为王。

sentences.english: Elisha went to Damascus, and Ben-Hadad king of Aram was ill.
sentences.chinese: 以利沙来到大马色，亚兰王便哈达正患病。

sentences.english: Notice the two nearby stars, Rigel Kentaurus and Hadar.
sentences.chinese: 注意两颗邻近的星星，参宿七和哈达尔。

sentences.english: When Baal-Hanan died, Hadad succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 户珊死了，比达的儿子哈达接续他作王。

sentences.english: But Ben-Hadad king of Aram escaped on horseback with some of his horsemen.
sentences.chinese: 亚兰王便哈达骑着马和马兵一同逃跑。

sentences.english: When Baal-Hanan died, Hadad succeeded him as king.
sentences.chinese: 巴勒哈南死了，哈达接续他作王。

sentences.english: The original Mrs. Hak-Tak was angry, and screamed at her husband.
sentences.chinese: 原来的哈达太太生气了，对着她丈夫嚷嚷起来。

definition: Mongol ethnic group of north China and Inner Mongolia
Bayan county in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
Dêgê county (Tibetan: sde dge rdzong) in Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘孜藏族自治州[Gan1 zi1 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Sichuan (formerly in Kham province of Tibet)
Horqin or Xorchin, famous Mongolian archer/Horqin district or Xorchin raion of Tongliao city 通遼市|通辽市[Tong1 liao2 shi4], Inner Mongolia
Mt Gangdisê (6656m) in southwest Tibet, revered by Tibetans as the center of the universe
Khampa, subdivision of Tibetan ethnic group/former Tibetan province of Kham, now split between Tibet and Sichuan
butter tea (Tibetan, Mongolian etc drink derived from milk)
